name: verdaccio-gitlab

scripts.license: license-checker --onlyAllow 'Apache-2.0, BSD, BSD-2-Clause, BSD-3-Clause, ISC, MIT, Unlicense, WTFPL' --production
scripts.lint: eslint index.js && eclint check && markdownlint README.md
scripts.release:major: changelog -M && git commit -a -m 'docs: updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version major && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:minor: changelog -m && git commit -a -m 'docs: updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version minor && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:patch: changelog -p && git commit -a -m 'docs: updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version patch && git push origin && git push origin --tags

description: private npm registry (Verdaccio) using gitlab-ce as authentication and authorization provider
